hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash
echo id: $TEST_LINUX echo url: $TEST_LINUX_URL echo service id: $TEST_LINUX_SERVICE_ID echo tags: $TEST_LINUX_TAGS echo machine names: $TEST_LINUX_MACHINE_NAMES echo public addresses: $TEST_LINUX_PUBLIC_ADDRESSES echo private addresses: $TEST_LINUX_PRIVATE_ADDRESSES echo ----- machines ----- count=0 for NAME in $TEST_LINUX_MACHINE_NAMES do echo machine: $NAME ((count++)) done if [ $count -ne 2 ]; then echo "Number of machine names is not 2: $count" exit 1 fi echo ----- public addresses ----- count=0 for ADDRESS in $TEST_LINUX_PUBLIC_ADDRESSES do echo public address: $ADDRESS ((count++)) done if [ $count -ne 2 ]; then echo "Number of public addresses is not 2: $count" exit 1 fi echo ----- private addresses ----- count=0 for ADDRESS in $TEST_LINUX_PRIVATE_ADDRESSES do echo private address: $ADDRESS ((count++)) done if [ $count -ne 2 ]; then echo "Number of private addresses is not 2: $count" exit 1 fi
